title: Unintentional Dodges due to Client lag in the ban/pick phase of Draft mode.
body: While I personally have not experienced this issue my friends who I play with frequently experience serious lag which causes unintentional dodges from the client lagging and thus not allowing them to ban and/or pick. It's become a rather regular problem that has gotten on all of our nerves given that they did not experience this issue on the old client. It seems unfair to have to wait 5 to 15 minutes because of something beyond their control, if there is a fix I would really appreciate knowing about it so I can relay that information to them.

replies.body: Have your friends try running the new **low-spec mode** in the client options. It will reduce some of those flashy animations on champion select and should be able to let them get their bans and picks in quicker!
